title: Test 1 - Phần 6 - Ghép câu và viết lại câu

questions.prompt:
Sắp xếp các cụm từ sau để tạo câu hoàn chỉnh:
James Bell / has worked for a / perfume company / for over twenty / years.
questions.answer: James Bell has worked for a perfume company for over twenty years.

questions.prompt:
Sắp xếp các cụm từ sau để tạo câu hoàn chỉnh:
She can't / smell anything, even / the fragrances / of roses.
questions.answer: She can't smell anything, even the fragrances of roses.

questions.prompt: Mary has been studying French for 5 years. Viết lại câu bắt đầu bằng: Mary started …
questions.answer: Mary started studying French 5 years ago.

questions.prompt: You should always wear a helmet when riding a bike. Viết lại câu bắt đầu bằng: You ought …
questions.answer: You ought to wear a helmet when riding a bike.

questions.prompt: How about going for a walk in the park? (we) Viết lại câu bắt đầu bằng: Why don't …
questions.answer: Why don't we go for a walk in the park?

questions.prompt: It's important to turn off the lights when leaving the room. Viết lại câu bắt đầu bằng: Don't forget …
questions.answer: Don't forget to turn off the lights when leaving the room.
